entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Elliot Lake
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending after midnight then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h gusting to 40 late this evening. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near noon. Temperature steady near minus 7. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 13 in the evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023
